articles.title: Zomato nearing an all-stock deal to take over Blinkit: Report
articles.description: Zomato and Blinkit are at an advanced stage discussing the deal structure
articles.content: Indias online food delivery platform Zomato Ltd. is nearing an all-stock deal to take over instant grocery delivery service Blinkit, according to people familiar with the matter.
